author: mandrenguyen
body:
Sets up heavy-ion eras for 2024:
- Implements HI reco, i.e.,`pp_on_PbPb` type eras and their corresponding MC relval workflows (161,161.2,161.02, etc)
- Updates the UPC eras to be based on `Run3_2024`, rather than just `Run3`, although I think for the moment they're equivalent

Note that certain sim customizations for the ZDC and HF fine-grained bit are for now just copied from the 2023 era.  They are extended to the UPC era, although this era is so far only used for the reco step, not for the digi one.  In case the UPC era is used for digi at some point, it's better to change this now.  

The heavy-ion embedding (event overlay) workflows are not extended to 2024 yet.   This will be done in a subsequent PR.  

No backport will be needed.
title: Update heavy-ion eras for 2024 + add MC RelVal workflows
